mapper.select: select DISTINCT sm.id, sm.pid, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_name, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_sort, sm.perms, sm.paths, sm.component, sm.selected, sm.params, sm.is_cache, sm.is_show, sm.is_disable, sm.create_time, sm.update_time FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sr.id = srm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON srm.menu_id = sm.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND sm.menu_type in ('C', 'A') AND su.id = #{adminId}

select DISTINCT sm.id, sm.pid, sm.menu_type, sm.menu_name, sm.menu_icon, sm.menu_sort, sm.perms, sm.paths, sm.component, sm.selected, sm.params, sm.is_cache, sm.is_show, sm.is_disable, sm.create_time, sm.update_time FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sr.id = srm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu sm ON srm.menu_id = sm.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND su.id = #{adminId} ORDER BY menu_sort DESC
